title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
description: A collection of twelve short stories featuring Sherlock Holmes.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A classic novel about manners, marriage, and morality in early 19th-century England.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality, told through a child's eyes.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about totalitarianism.
